bibl.title: Greek Lyric. IV. Bacchylides, Corinna, and Others.
bibl.seg: CAMPBELL David A. (Edited and Translated by), Greek Lyric. IV. Bacchylides, Corinna, and Others. (The Loeb Classical Library. 461.)
Cambridge, Mass. - London, Harvard University Press, 1992, 8°, [vi-]421 pp. ISBN 0-674-99508-2. £10.50.
C.R. par Daniel Donnet, AntCl 63 (1994) p. 343. - S.R. Slings, Mnemosyne 4a s., 48 (1995) pp. 469-473 [concerne aussi: vol. V, 1993]. - Martin L. West, CR N.S., 43 (1993) pp. 236-238.
